none.author: jeklouda@microsoft.com
none.comment: Add Menus capabilities to test app

patch.author: aeun@microsoft.com
patch.comment: Source code will now throw errors instead of throwing strings across the repo.

patch.author: ramourt@microsoft.com
patch.comment: `null` runtimeConfig is no longer allowed during initialization. This will now throw a "Received runtime config is invalid" error.

minor.author: jekoch@microsoft.com
minor.comment: change the constructor function to make the onRecordingStarted callback mandatory, make onRecordingStopped an optional property that can be passed to the constructor.  This is because without the onRecordingStopped, the VideoController doesn't do anything.

major.author: lakhveerkaur@microsoft.com
major.comment: The API registerFocusEnterHandler has been moved from teamsCore namespace to Pages

major.author: ramourt@microsoft.com
major.comment: `core.executeDeepLink` has been renamed and moved to `app.openLink`
